topic.title: Admission Medications Section (entries optional) (V3) - conformance rules

section.p: The section contains the medications taken by the patient prior to and at the time of admission to the facility.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1198-10098, CONF:1198-10392, CONF:1198-32560 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.44"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2015-08-01"
SHALL conform to Hospital Admission Medications Section Entries Optional template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.44)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-15482)/@code="42346-7" Medications on Admission (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1198-15483, CONF:1198-32142)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:1198-10102, CONF:1198-15484)
Conforms to Admission Medication2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.36:2014-06-09)
SHALL conform to Hospital Admission Medications Section Entries Optional template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.44)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-15482)/@code="42346-7" Medications on Admission (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1198-15483, CONF:1198-32142)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:10100, R2.0=CONF:1098-10100)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:10101, R2.0=CONF:1098-10101)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:1198-10102, CONF:1198-15484)
Conforms to Admission Medication2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.36:2014-06-09)

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:10098, CONF:10392 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.44"

Consol Hospital Admission Medications Section Entries Optional SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15482)/@code="42346-7" MEDICATIONS ON ADMISSION (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15483)
Consol Hospital Admission Medications Section Entries Optional SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:10100, R2.0=CONF:1098-10100)
Consol Hospital Admission Medications Section Entries Optional SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:10101, R2.0=CONF:1098-10101)

Consol Hospital Admission Medications Section Entries Optional If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:10102, CONF:10110) Conforms to Admission Medication (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.36)
